failure.message:
org.scalatest.exceptions.TestFailedException: didPass was false Hint: Moving left, right and down should work as expected -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- This is what went wrong:

failure.message:
org.scalatest.exceptions.TestFailedException: didPass was false Hint: Moving left, right and down should work as expected -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- This is what went wrong:
step=0, rand=5, actions=<> Want | Got ✗ ----------------- ...T... | IIIIIII ..TTT.. | IIIIIII ....... | IIIIIII ....... | IIIIIII
